entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SuperPMI: Improve superpmi-diffs summarization #80719
    Future
  • SuperPMI: Improve superpmi-diffs pipeline parallelism: split asmdiffs and tpdiff #80718
    Future
  • 1 XOR 1 computes to 1 in release mode #80711
    8.0.0
  • Regression: "The path must be absolute." on Debian Linux #80710
  • Http/SSl StressTest build failures #80706
    8.0.0
  • Json generator should hoist property values in serialization fast-path when ignore condition on write is set #80703
  • XML deserialize self closing raw element #80699
  • Deadlock when recursive resolving scoped services from another Thread #80697
  • System.InvalidOperationException: 'Cannot read keys when either application does not have a console or when console input has been redirected. Try Console.Read. #80695
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'op1->gtEffectiveVal() == base' in `gtMarkAddrMode` when runing aspnet collections with JitStress=2 #80690
    8.0.0
  • [iOS][globalization][icu] Tracking issue for HybridGlobalization: Native API + ICU #80689
  • Workaround for providing support for ConcurrentBag types #80688
  • [QUIC] Bidirectional stream cannot start with receiving #80687
    Future
  • System.TypeInitializationException: PosixSignalRegistration at Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.HostingAbstractionsHostExtensions.Run(IHost host) #80686
  • No-op EventListener + idle Web app = 190 MB/h native memory leak #80684
  • Segfault when attaching profiler #80683
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\diagnosticport\\diagnosticport\\diagnosticport.cmd #80680
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror.sh #80679

Closed

  • NativeAOT RC2 crash with GVMs on linux-x64 #77070
    8.0.0
  • SslStream.ReadAsyncInternal() throws misleading exception if stream is disposed while reading #78586
    8.0.0
  • Regression from Propagate only BBF_COPY_PROPAGATE PR #78040
    8.0.0
  • Alpine 3.17 images causes SSL Error "unsafe legacy renegotiation disabled" #80641
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'GetLayout()->GetClassHandle() != NO_CLASS_HANDLE' during 'Morph - Global' #80616
  • The type initializer for 'System.Data.SqlClient.TdsParser' threw an exception #80672
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput.WriteLine does not work properly on macOS. #80648
  • zsh comes up on macOS even though System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.CreateNoWindow is specified as true. #80649
  • Memory access out of bounds #41455
    Future
  • Nested StreamWriter disposure #80606
  • Failed to start platform. Reason: TypeError: stackSave is not a function #41942
    Future
  • DynamicObject: Is it possible to customize null propagation operator behavior for dynamic object? #61401
    Future
  • Issue in ECDsaCertificateExtensions.CopyWithPrivateKey with TPM #75971
    8.0.0
  • Performance profiler support and memory dump diagnostics for WebAssembly #61797
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal] Add a IJsonSerializerOptionsFactory interface. #79939
    Future
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.ValueTuple, Version=4.0.2.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=cc7b13ffcd2ddd51' or one of its dependencies #27533
    Future
  • QUIC and HTTP/3 tests should log which exact version of msquic they use #75596
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • add unsupported attributes to System.Net.Security #80717
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Fix overwriting of superpmi log file #80716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Harden and re-enable DualMode socket tests #80715
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add the DbgDisablePagemapUse environment variable to control pagemap usage #80714
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix HttpStress & SslStress #80713
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Solve recently introduce ASCII regression #80709
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [release/7.0] Fix multiple dumps from being generated #80708
    Servicing-consider, area-PAL-coreclr
  • [browser] symbolicate to avoid undefined stack #80707
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Don't try to fold ADD(CNS, CNS-handle) in gtWalkOp #80704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Add error code to the assert error message #80702
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Add error code to the assert error message #80701
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • [mono][interp] Add 16 byte default alignment to interp frames #80700
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Update JsonSerializerOptions.AddContext to have combine semantics. #80698
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT fixes around data flow analysis #80694
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #80693
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix parsing the output of ping on Samsung phones #80692
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.x
  • JIT: Add a stress mode that poisons implicit byrefs #80691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Optimize the layout of the extra_method_table. #80682
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Make it possible to construct StackFrame without MethodBase #80681
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Sync ILLink #80678
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Generate fewer templates for generic virtual methods #80600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add type loader support for resolving static virtuals #80601
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Refactor lookupNamedIntrinsic to avoid common duplicate checks #80705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Normalize RepoRoot path to improve logs readability #80664
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Add error code to the assert error message #80423
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • JIT: Fix implicit byref block expansion #80659
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tests for exercising certificates with platform provider keys #80558
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][interp] Expand bblocks reordering with common patterns to facilitate propagation of values #80362
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Cleanup some unused functions/headers #80618
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Rename System.Text.Json test exclusion #80676
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [QUIC] Log msquic version and commit hash to event log and to test output. #80612
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Make reading custom attributes in NativeLibrary avoidable #80677
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add logger and tests for xml parsing in NativeAOT #80470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • allow to set custom serial speed on Linux #80534
    os-linux, area-System.IO.Ports
  • [browser] improve default initial memory size #80507
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid unobserved ReadAheadTask exceptions in HttpConnection #80214
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Prefix exported symbols defined via EntryPoint of UnmanagedCallersOnl… #79880
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Implement Startup hooks support in Mono #80391
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add statically linked libnuma support for AOT #80671
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable outerloop tests on mono/mobile and fix timeout in sendtohelixhelp.proj #79885
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • Remove usage of ComPlus_ variables in tests #78377
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger]Disable test which is getting stuck #80658
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Conditionally disable `--allow-undefined` #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Ldp stp modifications flag #80614
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold `static readonly VectorX` to GT_CNS_VEC #80670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][browser] enable closure compiler for dotnet.js #80178
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Check return type compatibility for method GDVs #80228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix fuzzers for .NET 8 SDK publish #80673
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] debugger tests- Misc improvements #80660
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Debugger-mono
  • Use SetupProperties to set properties related to NativeAOT and remove the top-level defaults #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Draft] Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • JIT: maintain pred lists during loop unrolling #80625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Count #80662
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-16
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Simplify LLVM object writer #2171
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement a few more opcodes, restore IL tests and fix bugs #2170
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix most warnings for the `HelloWasm` runtime test #2168

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: dispatch #2145

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet new` emits files with two periods before extension #29962
  • Whats the triage process here? #29960
  • Unable to build macos binaries on linux #29955

Closed

  • "dotnet tool restore" failing when run concurrently in CI -- DotnetToolSettings.xml locked #29535
  • Templates for `struct`, `enum`, `record` #28915
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2089789 #29964
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2089678 #29963
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix an issue with delegate declaration. Fix an issue with Simplifier and removing nullability. #29961
    Area-GenAPI

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29952
    Area-Infrastructure
  • This call is failing on the Darwin leg in installer. (#29916) #29939

Updated

  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
  • Introduce Dependabot for updating the same dependencies used in dotnet/templating #29921
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29940
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29945
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0072: False positive when using switch expression on integer #66433

Closed

  • Method dropdown selects a random item when a different item is clicked #66290
  • The `Simplifier` removes Nullable for return types and parameters #66378

PullRequests

Created

  • Yield completion provider #66435

Updated

  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly references #66430
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit unreachable `when` clauses by `NullableWalker` #66405
  • Take incremental nullability snapshot for local functions #66406
    Area-Compilers
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Initial syntax types for collection literals #66412
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity instead of Duende.IdentityServer for Blazor WebAssembly App with Individual Accounts and ASP.NET Core Hosted #46131
  • Azure AD and Azure AD B2C application roles using Application role manager with Microsoft Identity platform #46130
  • WebApplication.CreateBuilder ignores Logging:EventLog:SourceName #46128
  • [Blazor] Remove CustomElements package and samples from asplabs #46127
    .NET 8 Planning
  • AntiforgeryValidationException #46124
  • IClaimsTransformation do not automagically compose #46120
  • Please find a way to put .net and other popular components in the CDN for wasm #46119
  • [Kestrel] Count all traffic per request, including headers #46118
  • [Kestrel] HTTPS with ServerCertificateSelector, build full chain every connection, who to cache it? #46117

Closed

  • TEST: Automated move to AzDO #46061
  • Blazor: Navigation.BaseUri Incorrect on Forwarded Ports #45081
    Discussions
  • Unclear how you should respond to Parameter changing after #26230 #45152
    Discussions
  • custom inspect element for blazor #46107
  • Like other .net solutions, it is expected from blazor that if .net was uploaded from one app and it was available in the browser cache, there is no need to load .net in another program. #46123
  • Blazor WASM PWA app published to github pages - PWA not working, errors in console, cannot access .json file #46027
  • Implement IEndpointMetadataProvider on Result types like Forbid, Unauthorized, etc #45535
  • OutputCacheAttribute ignores excludeDefaultPolicy if a custom BasePolicy is defined #45564
  • net7.0 101 file upload crashes stackoverflow #45928

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `af74f44` to `83c2bdc` #46122
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9345421` to `356fc30` #46121
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Don't check in blazor.*.js files #45883
    area-blazor
  • Run test on Linux and Mac #45642
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Guard against httpcontext disconnect race #42838
    area-runtime
  • Fix Blazor PageContext disposal #46097
    area-blazor
  • To get host address in Configure method of Startup class #46110
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enumerate paramnames on startup #46086
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ImageSource.FromResource random image... #12701
  • Map for WinUI #12694
  • .Net MAUI - Shell Navigation Back button title not works properly - #iOS #12692
  • .NET MAUI GIVING ERRORS AFTER UPDATING FROM VS 2022 17.4.3 TO 17.4.4 #12681
  • Simplification of interface declaration in code #12678
    Backlog

Closed

  • ISecureStorage.GetAsync should return nullable string #9670
    Backlog
  • Can't access Color type in net7.0-windows10.0.19041.0 #12655
  • #elif WINDOWS doesn't work #6815
  • [MacCatalyst] Handler not found exception after upgrading from 7.0.49 to 7.0.52 #12699
  • .NET MAUI Issue with coding Xamarin form <Grid> Type #12649
  • The app does not show. No problem or prompt appear #12594
  • Don't run #12665
  • Example doesn't work #12683
  • error 0x80070005 #12666
  • MAUI Community Toolkit Popup Background Is Not Transparent #12654
  • MAUI Community Toolkit Popup Displayed Out Window Bounds On MacCatalyst #12652
  • How to disable bitcode strip for Google Sign In ? #12631
  • How to disable bitcode strip for Google Sign In ? #12663
  • Android 12 SplashScreen not working #11988
  • Localization completely broken in IOS apps #12684
  • But what if I want to use Maui to create a normal exe? #12668
  • Android Release build - slow and ends with errors, blocker from xamarin migration #12426
  • Resx file does not produce designer file, application is crashing #7504
    Backlog
  • CONTROL TEMPLATES CRASHING #12490
  • Add GoogleServicesJson Build Action #1346

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0.1xx-sr1.2] Disable the windows deployment manager by default #12698
  • [release/7.0.1xx-sr1.2] Only set PublishReadyToRun for apps and not libs #12697
  • [Android] Align dash effect between Border and Shapes #12693
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.5.1.1 to 1.6.0 #12687
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.2 to 4.14.2 #12686
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12679
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [net7.0] Fix the implicit Windows DefineConstants #12700
  • Mark ISecureStorage- and SecureStorage.GetAsync returning a nullable string. #12673
    community ✨
  • [net7.0] Ensure image creation on any thread #12690
  • [net7.0] Use the correct property when asking the UICollectionViewLayout to update #12696
  • Fix the implicit Windows DefineConstants #12680
  • [net7.0] Address Android SearchBar keyboard issue relating to TextTransform #12695
  • [net7.0] Cache grid cell measurements to avoid re-measures on second pass #12689
  • [net7.0] [iOS] ItemsViewController add `_measurementCells` null checks #12691

Updated

  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Ensure iOS always has the required splash storyboard #12677
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why when I rename a table it drops and creates a new table? #30078
  • Massive performance decrease on Migrate #30077
  • How to mock response for GetConnectionString()? #30075
  • Stylecop is interfering with EfBundle creation in docker image in gitlab CI #30074

PullRequests

Updated

  • Allow opting out of RETURNING/OUTPUT clauses in SaveChanges #29917
  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
  • Use precision/scale facets instead of store type when reverse engineering #30049

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-16
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add Codespaces for source build investigations #15285

Updated

  • Stable branding for 7.0.200 GA #15277
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #15278
